{"locationId": "1391", "organizationId": "1258", "name": "Plainfield Area Interfaith FP", "address1": "22525 W Lockport St. ", "address2": null, "city": "Plainfield", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "60544", "country": null, "phone": "815-439-8394", "phoneExt": null, "website": null, "latitude": "41.61", "longitude": "-88.17", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "The Plainfield Area Interfaith Food  Pantry is 100% volunteer run.  Our Guidelines provide that: As an  expression of God and Christ's 
compassion for all people, we shall use  the resources of the Plainfield
 Area Interfaith Food Pantry to alleviate  the distress suffered by 
needy people in the Plainfield area (Plainfield School District 202 boundaries).  The pantry provides both pre-packed essentials and a self-selected shopping option.  To register, visit our main office at the Plainfield Township building on Lockport St. on any of our published distribution days between 10:15 and 11 am or call to make other arrangements.", "notes": "", "contactName": null, "contactPhone": "815-439-8394", "contactEmail": "administrator@plainfieldfoodpantry.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 2, "regionName": "Northern Illinois Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "dbf64577-4f05-4753-a6ec-ebbbd9c99e9c.png", "website": "solvehungertoday.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
